name: home-server-ip-to-google-domain-ddns
description: > ### **Create token.json file** > 1. Create at Path ./ > 2. in file you can can type like this > ``` > [ >  { >   "user": "(username)", >   "pass": "(password)", >   "domain": "(domain name like example.com)" , >  }, >  { >   "user": "(username)", >   "pass": "(password)", >   "domain": "(domain name like www.example.com)" , >  } > ] > ```
author: chinhchin
